s: EZ-gro products were sold nationwide through many of the big box retailers. With the advent of e-commerce, most notably Amazon, EZ-gro was changed to Hydrohort, to better represent the product line. The EZ-gro name was maintained as a brand under Hydrohort, as other brands were developed.
